Package Spooding.Spooder

Class MongoConnect

java.lang.Object
Spooding.Spooder.MongoConnect
Direct Known Subclasses:
Crawler, SentimentalAnalysis, SentimentData, WordCloudGenerator
public abstract class MongoConnect
extends java.lang.Object
Contains all the methods needed to establish a connection as well as CRUD operations customized to this application

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MongoConnect()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void exportRedditMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<RedditPost> redditList)
    Connects to the reddit collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of RedditPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
    protected void exportSentimentMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> sentimentArray)
    Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of SentimentPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
    protected void exportSTMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<STPost> postArray)
    Connects to the straitstimes collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of STPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
    protected void exportTwitterMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<TwitterPost> twitterList)
    Connects to the twitter collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of TwitterPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
    protected java.util.ArrayList<RedditPost> importRedditMongo()
    Connects to the reddit collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into ReddiPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.
    protected java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> importSentimentMongo()
    Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into SentimentPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list
    protected java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> importSentimentMongo​(java.lang.String source)
    Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents, based on their source into SentimentPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list
    protected java.util.ArrayList<STPost> importSTMongo()
    Connects to the straitstimes collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into STPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.
    protected java.util.ArrayList<TwitterPost> importTwitterMongo()
    Connects to the twitter collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into TwitterPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • importRedditMongo

      protected java.util.ArrayList<RedditPost> importRedditMongo()
      Connects to the reddit collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into ReddiPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of RedditPost objects.

    • importTwitterMongo

      protected java.util.ArrayList<TwitterPost> importTwitterMongo()
      Connects to the twitter collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into TwitterPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of TwitterPost objects.

    • importSTMongo

      protected java.util.ArrayList<STPost> importSTMongo()
      Connects to the straitstimes collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into STPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of STPost objects.

    • importSentimentMongo

      protected java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> importSentimentMongo()
      Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents into SentimentPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list
      Returns:
      ArrayList of SentimentPost objects.

    • importSentimentMongo

      protected java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> importSentimentMongo​(java.lang.String source)
      Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and extracts out individual documents, based on their source into SentimentPost objects, whereby they're stored into a array list
      Parameters:
      source - source type to be extracted
      Returns:
      ArrayList of SentimentPost objects according to source type

    • exportRedditMongo

      protected void exportRedditMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<RedditPost> redditList)
      Connects to the reddit collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of RedditPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
      Parameters:
      redditList - ArrayList of RedditPost objects to be exported to MongoDB

    • exportTwitterMongo

      protected void exportTwitterMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<TwitterPost> twitterList)
      Connects to the twitter collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of TwitterPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
      Parameters:
      twitterList - ArrayList of TwitterPost objects to be exported to MongoDB

    • exportSTMongo

      protected void exportSTMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<STPost> postArray)
      Connects to the straitstimes collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of STPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
      Parameters:
      postArray - ArrayList of STPost objects to be exported to MongoDB

    • exportSentimentMongo

      protected void exportSentimentMongo​(java.util.ArrayList<SentimentPost> sentimentArray)
      Connects to the sentiment collection of MongoDB and exports the parsed in array list of SentimentPost objects into the MongoDB collection.
      Parameters:
      sentimentArray - ArrayList of SentimentPost objects to be exported to MongoDB
